I informed Booking that same night and to date the description has not been modified, very badly, both on the part of the hotel and Booking itself. This is the second problem I have on this trip with Booking reservations, the information is inaccurate or outright a lie. On the elevator itself it says that animals are not accepted in the breakfast room, but the same elevator is in that same room. Inadmissible.
This is why the score is so low.

I am editing since I have received a private message from the hotel insulting me. Here is demonstrated the category of the hotel and those responsible for it.

reviews.negative_text:
I have never written a review online before as but this hotel was so poor I felt I needed to say something about it. Firstly the hotel only has part time reception staff and there was no one there when we arrived in the afternoon.  This meant we had difficulties getting into the hotel as we had no idea and had been given no indication that you needed to use the machine near the entrance to book in digitally and were only able to get in when helped by a very friendly cleaner.  

Onto the room itself.  Again, I am realistic and knew it was a budget hotel so wasn't expecting too much but what is provided doesn't even reach budget standard.  We had booked for three people but our room has only 2 towels (both small).  We had only 2 pillows between three of us and the double bed had no bedsheet.  This did not change for the entire three days we were there.  Our room was also not cleaned the entire three days we were there which meant the one very small bin provided was filled very quickly and we had to use carrier bags to put our rubbish in.  On leaving the hotel I mentioned this to the reception staff and was told that you have to request to have your room cleaned.  This is ludicrous (I have never had to do this and have stayed in budget hotels before) and also, there was no indication of this when we booked/checked in.  They even provided a door-hanger that said please clean the room which we hung on the door every day.  Why provide this if you still have to ask for the room to be cleaned.

I really enjoyed Frejus and St Raphael (both lovely towns) but if I ever visit again I will give this hotel a swerve.

reviews.negative_text:
Non sono solita recensire negativamente gli hotel, se non gradisco qualcosa mi limito a non recensire. Tuttavia questo caso √® diverso. Sento il dovere di fare la recensione, perch√© chi legge possa evitare di incorrere nel mio stesso errore.
Premetto che abbiamo passato 2 notti a Fr√©jus pagate 315 euro senza colazione, prenotando un hotel ibis per andare sul sicuro.
Sapevo della presenza limitata della reception (dalle 17 alle 21).
Quello che non sapevo era che avrei trovato un hotel fatiscente immerso nel contesto di un quartiere orribile, lontano 20 minuti a piedi dal mare e pi√π di mezz‚Äôora dal centro.
A completare il film dell‚Äôorrore, nell‚Äôhotel si aggirano personaggi strani.
Le pulizie vengono eseguite solo su richiesta e la camera (bruttina, anche se spaziosa) al nostro arrivo era abbastanza sporca (ci si sono sporcate le valige dopo averle appoggiate sul pavimento). Le lenzuola erano ingiallite e la federa di un cuscino era macchiata di muffa. Doveva esserci un sacco di polvere tanto che avevo il naso chiuso e le labbra mi bruciavano.
Sorpresona: nonostante i 157 euro a notte, non si ha diritto a un Phon. In una localit√† di mare. La cervicale ringrazia.
L‚Äôinsonorizzazione della stanza non esiste e all‚Äôinterno si sente qualunque rumore, anche le voci delle persone nel parcheggio (dal quarto piano!). immaginate quel che si sente dalla stanza accanto.
Di Asciugamano bisogna farsene bastare uno (per la faccia, per il corpo, per i capelli e si, anche per le parti intime). Diciamo, il nostro contributo a ridurre il consumo di acqua e elettricit√†.
Per concludere, ripeto, mi dispiace essere cos√¨ diretta, ma l‚Äôhotel ci ha davvero rovinato 2 giorni di vacanza. E per fortuna che erano 2, perch√© altrimenti avremmo lasciato la stanza prima del tempo. Abbiamo resistito solo perch√© la durata del soggiorno era breve.
√à un hotel completamente distante dagli standard degli altri ibis (anche budget) in cui ho avuto modo di soggiornare.
